name: Totally Normal Inn
description:
The Totally Normal Inn “Where past traditions meet modern luxury” When it comes to service, well we do the most whether you’re human or ghost! It’s your first day on the job as Manager of The Totally Normal Inn when you come across a note from the previous caretaker explaining that there’s more to the job than meets the eye! You always thought you saw something out of the corner of your eye, but told yourself it wasn’t real. Your illusion may be shattered, but that doesn’t mean that your guests should learn about these sociable specters! As more and more guests check-in be sure to keep these ghosts in check by night! You may find that some of your guests are nosier than others and if they come across a ghoul while roaming the hall it could be all over for the Totally Normal Inn! Collect ectoplasm to earn-power ups and protect the haunted furniture before the secret gets out. And remember, if anyone asks about the spirits at the Inn, it’s not real!


---------------------

Jason Rand - Programmer, Designer, UX DanzMacabre - Music, Sound Design, SFX, "The Husband" Catherine Rand - Art  Tony Corbitt Jr.- Art Jillian Wagner - SFX, Vocals, "Vixen", "Grandma"  Willis Reifsnyder - SFX, Vocals, "The Writer"  Faith Reifsnyder - Vocals, "The Wife"
